title: When an aram game goes for 55 minutes
body:
And all you wanted was 100 ip so you thought aram would be a quick way to get it.

I was garen vsing azir, teemo, lux, reksai and shaco 


Reskai goes in while we keep walking into traps from shaco and teemo then azir and lux blow us up from afar... fucking great game, gg fellas time worth spent trying to stop azir from killing my 4 other squishies while I get cc'd for 3k damage in 4 seconds with 300 mr. 

I run away, regen and only to rinse and repeat...
